message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL 

This paper is about automatic text summarization, which is a subfield of natural language processing (NLP). The paper specifically focuses on a large corpus of Chinese short text summarization dataset, which suggests that it is likely to belong to the arXiv sub-category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper uses recurrent neural network for summary generation, which falls under the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR), Machine Learning (cs.LG), Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI), and Deep Learning (cs.DL). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL, followed by cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, and cs.DL.
